text: Américo Simonetti (born 16 September 1936) is a Chilean equestrian. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics, the 1972 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1959 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 1963 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Américo Simonetti
